forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 5pm. Cloudy. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a low around 37. East wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the sun creeps toward its zenith, the skies over Boston wear a blanket of muted gray, hinting at the moisture that will soon embrace the city. While the chill of the day speaks of a high near 45, it is the creeping clouds that promise rain later in the afternoon, a drenching mere hours away. The air carries a crispness, a gentle northeast breeze stirring the contents of each pocket and jacket, reminding all that winter is still firm in its grasp. The opportunistic chance of precipitation at 30% suggests that one might enjoy a brisk walk or a leisurely coffee at a corner café, all while considering a waterproof layer for the evening that looms.

Come nightfall, that same air will turn heavy with impending rain, bringing solace to the earth as it quenches the thirst brought on by winter’s dry breath. As you prepare for the darkening skies, don your warmer attire—perhaps a cozy sweater under a lightweight waterproof coat, paired with sturdy boots to navigate the slick sidewalks. The prospect of a soaking rain, dressed in the muted tones of clouds, sets the stage for introspection. A perfect evening for a quiet read or an engaging movie, your choices inspired by the rhythm of the weather—reminding you, in the chill of the twilight, that even the most unassuming days can invite moments of peace and reflection.
